alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Kingfisher; Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:56AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kingfisher, north central Caddo, northwestern Oklahoma, eastern Blaine, western Logan and Canadian Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 656 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Ames to 7 miles north of Calumet to 6 miles northeast of Hinton. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Oklahoma City, El Reno, Kingfisher, Yukon, Mustang, Piedmont, Hinton, Hennessey, Union City, Crescent, Geary, Okarche, Okeene, Cashion, Calumet, Dover, Marshall, Cimarron City, Bridgeport, and Loyal. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 97 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
